content.p: The School of Politics and International Relations' research engages with the most fundamental political questions of our time. Our research activity is organised around centres and institutes. This framework provides an integrative and dynamic environment for staff to pursue individual and collective research projects. Dr William Daniel is an Associate Professor at the School of Politics and International Relations with research expertise in the politics of representation and the identities of politicians. The School of Politics and International Relations' research is international in scope and covers many important aspects of our political and social world in the UK and abroad. Research fellows Research degrees Law and Social Sciences building University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD
